name: Plant Business [Demo]
description:
A nice and easy to game to play where you can place plants and sell them as you earn coins.

Keybinds:

- 1-6 For plants (currently only 1)

- R to switch mode

Currently testing for a few days,  please provide ideas for the game as I want make this into a game. 

Note: Audio might be a little weird and off with the music, I still need to fix a few things as well as the shop, when the shop is finished or ready to be publish I will update the game.
